pageContent:
WILSON BOATENG
 1401 Winslow Ave, Union, New Jersey, 07083 ♦ (862) 414-5914 ♦ willyboatgh@yahoo.com.
    PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY   
Tableau Developer and Data Analyst with IT experience in Data Visualization, Implementation and 
Maintenance of Microsoft Structured Query Language applications and its related Database Platforms. 
Experienced in using Microsoft SSIS and TABLEAU PREP and other Data Analysis and Visualization tools 
in performing ETL Operations with excellent Data Mining and Dashboard Reporting skills.  
TECHNICAL SKILLS
Tableau Desktop
Tableau Server
Microsoft SQL Server hosted on Azure
MS Access
Oracle SQL
Tableau Prep
Hadoop
MS Excel
SSIS
   PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE   
TABLEAU DEVELOPER, 11/2018 – PRESENT
UBER Technologies, San Francisco, CA
 Filtering Data by multiple, complex conditions and assessing query efficiency.
Utilizing Tableau Prep in transforming data for factual and flawless Visualization.

 Filtering Data by multiple, complex conditions and assessing query efficiency.
Utilizing Tableau Prep in transforming data for factual and flawless Visualization.
Creating and analyzing a series of regional performance metrics that allow to link the KPI’s of multi-
channel dataset into a single efficient unit.
Analyzing drivers and riders’ ratings and locational trends.

Building and maintaining reports, dashboards, and metrics to monitor the performance of business 
products using tableau. 
Utilizing group by and aggregate functions, join functions and other SQL functions necessary for 
maintaining and creating queries needed for solving technology and monetization problems. 
Evaluating internal systems for efficiency, problems, and inaccuracies, developing and maintaining 
protocols for handling, processing, and cleaning data.
 Designing rich Graphic visualizations with modular design of reports, worksheets and views in Tableau 
using Bar charts, Line charts, Scatter plot and Heat Maps to highlight patterns in the data.
TABLEAU DEVELOPER, 11/2017 – 11/2018
Marriott Newark, NJ
Gathered and effectively presented data from various sources to business stakeholders in the form of 
manageable visual reports as specified in business requirements.
Generated Tableau Dashboard with quick/context/global filters, parameters and calculated fields on

manageable visual reports as specified in business requirements.
Generated Tableau Dashboard with quick/context/global filters, parameters and calculated fields on 
Tableau reports that allow to track and improve customer units.
Created Tableau Dashboards with interactive views, trends and drill downs along with user level 
security.
Supported the development and modification of Tableau views while preparing documentation and 
training users from respective units.
Built and maintained databases with excellent data warehousing skills. 
Blended multiple data sources to allow for different views on application data in a single dashboard.
DATA ANALYST, 08/2014 - 08/2017
MARRIOTT – Newark, NJ
Developed, implemented, and maintained leading-edge analytic systems, taking complicated problems and 
building simple frameworks
Identified trends and opportunities for growth through analysis of complex data sets

building simple frameworks
Identified trends and opportunities for growth through analysis of complex data sets
Evaluated organizational methods and provided source-to-target mappings and information-model 
specification documents for data sets
Created best-practice reports based on data mining, analysis, and visualization
Wrote SQL queries to store, sort, and retrieve data and exported them to tableau.
Wrote commands and queries that fetched and managed data from multiple tables using joins in SQL.

EDUCATION   
MBA: Marketing, 05/2018 
New Jersey City University - Jersey City, NJ, USA
B.COM: Accounting and Finance, 09/2010
University of Cape Coast -  Cape Coast, Ghana 
CERTIFICATION
Tableau Desktop Specialist – September, 2021
